charges.charge_description: 8 Usc 1326(A)(1) And (2) And (B)(1)   Illegal Re-Entry of Previously Deported Alien Into The United States (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant is Committed to The Custody of The United States Bureau of Prisons For A Period of 30 Months, to be Served Concurrently With His Sentence in Docket No. 10-Cr-233-01d. no Supervised Release to Follow. Special Assessment $100 to be Remitted Upon Deportation. no Fine Imposed. The Defendant Shall be Deported Upon Release From Custody.

charges.charge_description: 8:1326A.F   8 Usc 1326(A)(1) And (2) And (B)(1) - Illegal Re-Entry of Previously Deported Alien Into The United States
